title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 145-2.2 - Designation of privacy compliance officer
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 145-2.2 - Designation of privacy compliance officer

State Regulations
(a) The records access officer, as defined in
section
145-2.1
of this Subpart shall also
serve as the privacy compliance officer, whose business address is Division of
the Budget, State Capitol, Albany, NY 12223, and whose business phone number is
(518) 474-2331. (b) The deputy
privacy compliance officer is the Director of Administrative Services whose
address is the same as above and whose business phone number is (518)
474-5312. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
§§
145-2.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
